languages.text: Люди массово гибнут, пока идет расследование. Оказывается, источником хвори была оскверненная партия еды. Приходится уничтожить порченные запасы.
People die in droves so that the investigation may continue. The source of the disease is revealed to be a corrupted food shipment. The contaminated stores are destroyed with no room for regret.
languages.original_text: Люди массово гибнут, пока идет расследование. Оказывается, источником хвори была оскверненная партия еды. Приходится уничтожить порченные запасы.

traits.locale_text: People die in droves so that the investigation may continue. The source of the disease is revealed to be a corrupted food shipment. The contaminated stores are destroyed with no room for regret.
The filth taints a part of the population, but the holy mechanisms remain safe and sound.
People die in droves so that the investigation may continue. The source of the disease is revealed to be a corrupted food shipment. The contaminated stores are destroyed with no room for regret.
The corruption taints a part of the population, but the holy mechanisms remain safe and sound.

People die in droves so that the investigation may continue. The source of the disease is revealed to be a corrupted food shipment. The contaminated stores are destroyed with no room for regret.

People die in droves so that the investigation may continue. The source of the disease is revealed to be a corrupted food shipment. The contaminated stores are destroyed with no room for regret.
People die in droves so that the investigation may continue. The source of the disease is revealed to be a corrupted food shipment. The contaminated stores are destroyed with no room for regret.

languages.text: Les gens meurent par dizaines pour que l'enquête puisse continuer. L'origine de la maladie s'avère une cargaison de vivres corrompus. Les réserves contaminées sont aussitôt détruites afin d'éviter de plus amples dégâts.
languages.original_text: People die in droves so that the investigation may continue. The source of the disease is revealed to be a corrupted food shipment. The contaminated stores are destroyed with no room for regret.

traits.locale_text: Les gens meurent par dizaines pour que l'enquête puisse continuer. L'origine de la maladie s'avère une cargaison de vivres corrompus. Les réserves contaminées sont aussitôt détruites afin d'éviter de plus amples dégâts.

languages.text: 調査を継続させるために、多くの人々が命を落とした。病源は腐敗した食料の積荷であることが明らかになった。汚染された貯蔵品は、後悔の余地なく廃棄される。
languages.original_text: People die in droves so that the investigation may continue. The source of the disease is revealed to be a corrupted food shipment. The contaminated stores are destroyed with no room for regret.

traits.locale_text: 調査を継続させるために、多くの人々が命を落とした。病源は腐敗した食料の積荷であることが明らかになった。汚染された貯蔵品は、後悔の余地なく廃棄される。

languages.text: 为了找出疾病的原因，成千上万的人在疾病中丧生。到了最后，人们发现疾病的源头是一批遭到腐化的食物，随即立刻摧毁了被污染的仓库。
languages.original_text: People die in droves so that the investigation may continue. The source of the disease is revealed to be a corrupted food shipment. The contaminated stores are destroyed with no room for regret.

traits.locale_text: 为了找出疾病的原因，成千上万的人在疾病中丧生。到了最后，人们发现疾病的源头是一批遭到腐化的食物，随即立刻摧毁了被污染的仓库。

languages.text: Muere gente a raudales para que la investigación continúe. Se descubre que la enfermedad tiene su origen en un cargamento de comida corrompida. Las reservas contaminadas se destruyen sin que haya lugar para el remordimiento.
languages.original_text: People die in droves so that the investigation may continue. The source of the disease is revealed to be a corrupted food shipment. The contaminated stores are destroyed with no room for regret.

traits.locale_text: Muere gente a raudales para que la investigación continúe. Se descubre que la enfermedad tiene su origen en un cargamento de comida corrompida. Las reservas contaminadas se destruyen sin que haya lugar para el remordimiento.

languages.text: Es sterben haufenweise Leute, damit die Ermittlungen weitergehen können. Als Ursprung der Krankheit wird eine verdorbene Lebensmittellieferung identifiziert. Die verseuchten Vorräte werden zerstört.
languages.original_text: People die in droves so that the investigation may continue. The source of the disease is revealed to be a corrupted food shipment. The contaminated stores are destroyed with no room for regret.

traits.locale_text: Es sterben haufenweise Leute, damit die Ermittlungen weitergehen können. Als Ursprung der Krankheit wird eine verdorbene Lebensmittellieferung identifiziert. Die verseuchten Vorräte werden zerstört.

languages.text: Soruşturmanın devam edebilmesi için insanlar kitleler hâlinde ölüyor. Hastalığın kaynağının yozlaşmış bir gıda sevkiyatı olduğu ortaya çıkıyor. Hastalıklı depolar, tereddüt dahi edilmeden imha ediliyor.
languages.original_text: People die in droves so that the investigation may continue. The source of the disease is revealed to be a corrupted food shipment. The contaminated stores are destroyed with no room for regret.
